semantic_identifier: [GOLD-138]: Persist manual cluster merge/split decisions across re-ingest
title: Persist manual cluster merge/split decisions across re-ingest

sections.text: Manual merge/split operations in issue_clustering are not consistently preserved when the same source conversations are re-ingested, causing previously curated themes to revert or fragment. Add a durable “curation override” layer (merge groups + split rules) that is applied after automated clustering and before cluster summaries/tags are generated. Include a regression test that performs merge/split, replays ingestion, and asserts stable cluster IDs, membership, and curation metadata.
